English: ancestral; clan; family. Kind; class. to follow; to honour.
name of an emperor of the Sung dynasty.

Qieyun: 溪開四齊去?, 溪開三欣入?, 溪開四先入?

English: Kitans; Khitans-Tartars; people who ruled northern China (907-1115 A.D.) under the name of the Liao dynasty.
an ancient military office; the commander in chief.
God. a deified being. the emperor.
a ferry; to ferry across; to cross.
a servant. the chief minister of a State. to slaughter animals.
a subject; a vassal; a statesman.

Qieyun: 曉開一歌平?,曉開一歌去?
泥一模上?, 泥一模去?
羣開三B支平?, 羣開三B支去?

English: to spread; to levy; to pay; to compose.

Qieyun: 知開三陽平?, 知開三陽去?
English: to extend; stretch. to claim; to publish. to display. to boast.
a greeting for the emperor. the emperor.
